Look Ma! I Own a Company!

By Tim Smith · October 11th, 2012

Today was the quite the interesting day. I'm officially the owner of Anythin' Goes LLC. I'm a business owner and that freaks me out.

The Reason Behind the Name

I chose Anythin’ Goes because I want it to be the parent company over my different projects. I'm not only doing design work, I host a podcast and soon (hopefully) I'll be publishing a magazine.

I don't know exactly what lies in the future for me or the company but I'm excited to find out and I hope you'll come along for the ride. I think this is all for the best. I feel like finally things are turning around and I'm headed in a good direction, both in my life and career.

Interested in working with me?
